title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip      Please call the park to plan a field trip.  The park auditorium and ranger staff can only accommodate 50 people.  If you have more than 50 people please schedule a visit on different days.  This will provide the best educational experience for your group.We can offer either a musket demonstration (20 minutes)or a battlefield tour (120 minutes).
